name: LARISSA DANTAS REQUENA
title: Front End Developer | React | TypeScript | Angular | UI/UX | APIs
location: São Bernardo do Campo - São Paulo, Brazil
summary: Front-End Engineer with 5+ years of experience building modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications using Angular and TypeScript. Specialized in translating design concepts into modular, reusable UI components with strong attention to responsiveness, usability, accessibility, and visual consistency. Experienced in collaborating cross-functionally with engineering, product, and design teams to deliver intuitive digital experiences in high-traffic environments, including large-scale web platforms. Strong focus on front-end performance optimization, clean architecture, maintainability, and continuous improvement.

projects.title: Weex
projects.stack: Angular, React, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Figma
bullets: Contributed to Brazil’s largest corporate health campaign & SIPAT SaaS platform, supporting thousands of users nationwide.
Developed modular and reusable Angular components aligned with the design system, ensuring scalability and consistency.
Delivered responsive and adaptive interfaces optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Improved usability and performance through iterative UI refinements based on stakeholder and user feedback.
Collaborated closely with backend engineers to ensure accurate business logic integration and reliable data flows.

experience.company: Itexto Consultoria em Tecnologia da Informação
bullets: Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using Angular and TypeScript, emphasizing modular, reusable, and maintainable components.
Build responsive, high-performance user interfaces ensuring consistent UX across desktop, tablet, and mobile environments.
Translate Figma design concepts and wireframes into pixel-accurate, production-ready interfaces.
Collaborate cross-functionally with Product Managers, Designers, QA, and Backend Engineers to align UI behavior with business logic and product strategy.
Optimize front-end performance by improving load times, refactoring legacy code, and applying clean architecture principles.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement of front-end standards and best practices.
Support usability improvements by analyzing user feedback and iterating on interface enhancements.
Document components, workflows, and technical decisions to improve maintainability and long-term scalability.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
